item.title: The Art of the Resume
item.description: If you ask 100 people about what a resume should be, you’ll likely get close to 100 answers. “It should be no more than 1 page long” “it should have a statement of objective” “never put your interested on a resume” “only list your last 3 jobs” And on and on. Most of it is conflicting, and pretty much none of it will work for everyone. These days, resumes are a crap-shoot.
